title: Whisky shortbread ding dangs
description: Norman made these oaty, iced shortbread biscuits to hang on the Christmas tree, but the plain biscuits are delicious and need no ornament.For this recipe you will need a food processor and to ice the biscuits you will need a hand-held electric mixer, cocktail sticks and 3 disposable piping bags fitted with fine plain nozzles.
ingredients: 40g/1½oz instant porridge oats, blitzed in a food processor
